-e ---

see 𓏭 𓏮 𓇌 𓇋 𓇋 𓆄𓆄

𓇋𓇋 ee : 𓇋,𓏤,i,ei,y,ü,ee (as in free)
𓇋𓇋 羽 yǔ ⇔ yì 义 (feather = Egyptian symbol for justice )
𓇋𓇋 YU < LL : ʎuˈɾɛd < lloret

𓇋 𓂧 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓀔 girl : 𓇋-child > יַלְדָּה yaldá ⇔ lad יֶלֶד yéled

𓇍 #ỉỉ #jj •irba <> 𓂻 𓇋 𓇋𓇋

𓇋𓇋𓏏 reeds

𓇋 𓂧 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓀔 child < chird 𓄡 𓇋 𓇋 𓂋 𓏏 𓀔

Adjectives via suffix -y -𓇋𓇋 -𓏮 fun => funny -wie -ji -ij -ig -ious -ish
Adjectives via suffix -ia -𓇋𓇋 -ية faranchia french -ial -al -ly -ful -voll -faire 𓅫𓅪𓅩
Adjectives via suffix -ich -𓇋𓇋 -ig -lig -lich -like -ly
